name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Miles DOSS

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Miles DOSS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
McDERMOTT and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John A. Reilly, Dist. Atty., Dennis C. McAndrews, Asst. Dist. Atty., Sandra L. Elias, Deputy Dist. Atty., Chief, Law & Appeals Unit, for appellant.
Marilyn J. Gelb, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
535 A.2d 1054
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Miles DOSS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1988.
Decided Jan. 22, 1988.
John A. Reilly, Dist. Atty., Dennis C. McAndrews, Asst. Dist. Atty., Sandra L. Elias, Deputy Dist. Atty., Chief, Law & Appeals Unit, for appellant.
Marilyn J. Gelb, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
